name: Holy Hell (Lusófona Games: Arcade Room)
description:
With the help of the Devil's sword, slash your way through the gates of Heaven and defeat all those who stand in your way!

After a life full of misfortune, you fall from a cliff onto a baby and ultimately sent to Hell. Absolutely furious, you blame God and decide to kill Him for what he has done to you. 

Main Features
  • Holy: In this demo, you will get to experience the second Zone of the Game. Right after unlocking the Impaling Dash.
  • Hell: Fight enemies with a unique combat system and impale them on your sword to change your attacks, battle unique bosses and upgrade your skills.
Controls

Holly Hell is compatible with most standard computer keyboards and mouses. It's also compatible with standard gamepad controllers. 

Move: WASD / Left Joystick 

Jump: Space / Cross Button

Mortal Flip (After 2 slashes): RMB / Triangle

Slashes + Spin to win: LMB / Square Button

Dash/Impale: F / R1

Pause: Esc / Start
